titles: An heart-melting exhortation together with a cordiall consolation presented in a letter from New-England to their dear countrymen of Lancashire : which may as well concern all others in these suffering times / by Richard Mather ... and William Tompson ...
author: Mather, Richard, 1596-1669.
Tompson, William, d. 1666.
publisher: Printed by A.M. for I. Rothwell ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
